fr.sorbonne_u.cps.smartcity.interfaces

Interface FireStationActionCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, FireStationActionImplI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FireStationActionInboundPort

    public interface FireStationActionCI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, FireStationActionImplI
    The component interface FireStationActionsCI defines the actions that a fire station offers to intervene on fires.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2022-02-01

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
